message: Getting a first kill on a difficult boss and the cheer that comes up is often worth the effort!
All the hot ladies whispering y- I mean organizing a guild meet and meeting all the people you have lead.
There's always the "girl with the hot voice on vent" that isn't hot at all.
watching people help shy new people who genuinely need help and want to participate.
@joshuajamesbh um, many of those hot ladies are dudes...just sayin'

Watching new people join the guild and become better players than I ever will be.  Helping them along through the low levels and watching them gradually take over responsibilities like grouping with new members or crafting a suit of armor for someone else in the guild for free.
